job.title: Data Scientist Analyst

the worlds largest and most diverse companies helping teams learn a new skill to make better datadriven decisions Youll work closely with experts from multiple fields and youll join a group of inquisitive collaborative and caring individuals that genuinely give a darn about helping our customers get real value from their databrbrThe Data Science Analyst is a great role for a proactive and detailoriented individual As a Data Science Analyst you will work with our account team to plan and configure multistage pipeline driven by the Unsupervised data ingestion and AI engines You will also work directly with our customers to explain the data and insights discovered through the Unsupervised platform You will be integral to building trust in Unsuperviseds ability to unleash the power of their data and empower their teams using datadriven decisionmaking ultimately driving incredible ROIbrbrstrongWhat youll dobrbrstrongul liApply datacentric and analytical techniques to realworld data from data ingestion configuring and running the Unsupervised AI platform and delivering insights for our customers li liWork crossfunctionally with the account team to influence our customers to solve business problems with datali liUnderstand your customers and their industries and ensure their unique needs are always being discovered and addressedli liDevelop intuition about different types of data and projects Guide the success team towards solutions li liAs the primary user of our internal tools youll be uniquely positioned to inform our product functionalityli liChampion continuous improvement by identifying and providing recommendations for technical delivery processesli brulstrongWhat youll bringbrbrstrongul liCustomer orientation You have experience in business intelligence or data science projects and interfacing with customers or key internal stakeholdersli liResultsdriven Youre a naturalborn executor who loves making todo lists and getting projects done When you hit a problem you have multiple ideas for ways to fix it li liExcellent communication skills both written and verbal You must be able to communicate with all users from technologists to VPs and CxOsli liStrong interpersonal skills You will work closely and productively with multiple stakeholders at each customer and internally at Unsupervisedli liStrategic thinking You strive to understand each
